Opinion
Per Curiam,

casebody.head_matter:
O’Donnell v. Hail, Appellant.
Argued March 17, 1971.
Before Bell, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Pomeroy and Barbieri, JJ.
Donald W. Bebenek, with him Raymond IT. Conaway, and Meyer, Darragh, Buckler, Bebenek d Eck, for appellant.
Edward J. Balzarini, with him Suto, Power, Balzarini & Walsh, for appellee.
June 1, 1971:
